title: Open an existing request in Live Support
content:
Live Support can open existing requests. To go to the Live Support page, select Run > Service Request > Live Support.

To open an existing request:

  1. Find the request.

    If the request you want isn't automatically displayed, you can find it in one of the following ways:

    • Type the ID in the Request ID box at the top of the page.

    • Select the user, and choose from the list of recent requests.

    • Select the user, and type the ID or keywords in the search box at the top of the list of recent requests.

  2. Select the request.

  3. Click . Service Management displays the request details.
